message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1000000.  This is a significant discount from its true market value.  While I'm confident you'll see the incredible potential in this product, I understand it may not be the right fit for everyone.  If you decline, I have another buyer lined up who is ready to pay $800000.  Please consider this offer carefully and let me know your decision.
